atlantic.title: Just Blame the First Lady
atlantic.topComment: I live in FL, and this is all just.... adorable. I mean, seriously, you guys need to up your corruption game. Pro tip: See if you can get a chief executive that has already absorbed massive federal fines before they are ever elected. I don't know if ...

atlantic.title: Japan's Oldest Businesses Have Survived for More Than 1,000 Years
atlantic.topComment: "Of those, 3,886 have been around for more than 200 years. As a point of comparison, only one in every four U.S. companies founded in 1994 was still operating in 2004, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics." These statistics don't really measur...
